definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: rinse out with hot water; [[גְּעִילָה]] rejection; Aram. [[געל]] Ithpe. be fouled, soiled)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[נׇּֽעֲלָה]] Le 26:43, Je 14:19, [[וְגׇֽעֲלָה]] cons. Le 26:30; [[גְּעַלְתִּים]] Le 26:44; [[גׇּֽעֲלוּ]] Ez Eze 16:45; Impf. 3 fs. [[תִּגְעַל]] Le 26:11, Le 26:15; Pt. f. [[גּׁעֶ֫לֶת]] Ez Eze 16:45, Eze 16:45; —abhor, loathe, (usually c. acc.), Yahweh, his people Le 26:11, Le 26:30, Le 26:44 (H) Je 14:19 (c. [[בְּ]]); the people, Yahweh's statutes Le 26:15, Le 26:43 (H); Ez Eze 16:45, Eze 16:45 women their husbands (fig., in proph. ag. Jerusalem).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: [[נִגְעַל מָגֵן גִּבּוֹרִים]] 2Sa 1:21 the shield of heroes was defiled RVm VB Kirkp. but < is rejected, cast away (with loathing) Dr, cf. Klo; LXX proswxqi/sqh.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[שׁוֹרוֹ עִבַּר]] [[וְלאׁ יַׁגְעִָל]] Job 21:10; and doth not cause, or allow, (the cow) to reject as loathesome Ra De, cf. Di:1, Di:2, however, of bull, cast away (semen), or shew aversion.
